summary: Make any body you want using new and improved base body and slider morphs in Bodyslide 2
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lWmKEdul.jpg[/IMG][/center]

The basic premise of this mod was to combine all current body shapes that exist out there into one single morphable body. Whether or not this is successful on that front is largely up to you.

[center][IMG]http://imgs.xkcd.com/comics/standards.png[/IMG][/center]

Requires:
Installation of [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]Bodyslide 2[/URL]

How to install (Manually):
1. Unrar folder.
2. Place the folder in your Skyrim directory.

How to install (NMM):
1. Download [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/?]Mod Organizer[/URL]
2. Follow instructions below

How to install (MO):
1. Download Mod
2. Make sure skeleton included in this file is NOT overwritten.

Features:
Brand new body made from scratch by Vioxsis (dubbed Unibody) including new hands and feet meshes that have mesh based nails. Because Skyrim needed a manicure.
author: Vioxsis and Blabba
